visual.visualInfo1: Select the Inquiry and Hit Collections.
visual.visualInfo2: More than one Hit Collection can be selected. To reduce the view to a single subsection, click on the coloured bar in the Inquiry Collection (left).
visual.visualInfo3: The view can be further reduced to a single text. A click on a single text will open the text view where the individual matches will be.

prompts.genericErrorDescription: Please contact us if the issue persists.
prompts.dbSrcMenuError: Error fetching database source menu. Database language is invalid.
prompts.queryWarning: Unable to display results. Please use the filters to adjust your query.

search.inputPlaceholder: Enter exact search term (whole words only)
search.noResultsTip: Try adjusting your search. Making sure you use an exact search term with whole words, correct punctuation and diacretical marks where relevant may help.

graph.histogramDataTitle: Distribution of the top files that have matches with the Inquiry Text:
graph.histogramDataSubtitle: The distribution chart displays the distribution of the top files that have matches with the Inquiry Text based on the accumulated length of the approximate matches. A maximum of 50 Hit Texts are shown.
graph.pieDataTitle: Distribution of all the matches found with the current filters across the various collections and their subsections.
graph.pieDataSubtitle: The distribution is weighted by length of matches found:
